title.narrative: Mid-Term Review of the Uganda Country Programme: 2018 – 2022

description.narrative: The main objective of the MTR is to assess the programme performance with regard to outcome and results, progress, challenges, developments in risk factors, possible need for adjustments, and programme management. The findings and recommendations of the review will inform decisions regarding adaptations and changes for the further implementation of the programme. MTR findings and recommendations will, where relevant, also include references to Danida funded activities outside the Country Programme. This includes providing suggestions for the planning of any remaining funds in the Country Programme, including unallocated funds. To the extent possible, such suggestions will focus on consolidating and strengthening existing engagements, or on activities closely linked to existing engagements, and with a view to underpin ongoing activities.
